item.description:
At this the opening meeting we will discusss all our wishes for our own investing,and for this group.This is the 2nd draft(the computer ate my homework)+ maybe it's true that,"brevity is the soul of wit".I hope to see you there.dale
WHERE: Bickford's Grille 325 Montvale Avenue, Woburn, MA 01801
WHEN:Mon.10/2/06,7pm
WHO:You and anyone else that is interested in R.E.
If you have any input please send it along

Thank You,dale
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club
